lead_paragraph: - Bulgarian Grigor Dimitrov smashed three rackets on his way to losing the Istanbul Open final to Argentine Diego Schwartzman on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Dimitrov Suffers Racket-Smashing Meltdown in Istanbul Final
headline.main: Dimitrov Suffers Racket-Smashing Meltdown in Istanbul Final
